mapper.select: SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS, TR_INFO, ACT_PERSONNEL, ACT_LOCATION, ACT_THEME, TR_MAP_LATITUDE, TR_MAP_LONGITUDE, LOCATION FROM TB_TOUR WHERE ACT_PERSONNEL = #{personnel} AND ACT_LOCATION = #{location} AND ACT_THEME = #{theme}
SELECT ac_name, ac_address FROM (SELECT *,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_TOUR )) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS, TR_INFO, ( SELECT COUNT(ac_name) FROM tb_wishlist WHERE ac_name = #{trName} ), LOCATION FROM TB_TOUR WHERE AC_NAME = #{trName}

SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS,LOCATION FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,ROWNUM FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,COUNT(AC_NAME) FROM TB_TOUR LEFT JOIN TB_WISHLIST USING(AC_NAME) GROUP BY AC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(AC_NAME)DESC)) JOIN TB_TOUR using(AC_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND ACT_LOCATION = #{location} AND ACT_THEME NOT IN ('맛집', '축제')

SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS,LOCATION FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,ROWNUM FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,COUNT(AC_NAME) FROM TB_TOUR LEFT JOIN TB_WISHLIST USING(AC_NAME) GROUP BY AC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(AC_NAME)DESC)) JOIN TB_TOUR using(AC_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND ACT_LOCATION = #{location} AND ACT_THEME = '맛집'

SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS,LOCATION FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,ROWNUM FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,COUNT(AC_NAME) FROM TB_TOUR LEFT JOIN TB_WISHLIST USING(AC_NAME) GROUP BY AC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(AC_NAME)DESC)) JOIN TB_TOUR using(AC_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND ACT_LOCATION = #{location} AND ACT_THEME = '축제'

SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS,LOCATION FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,ROWNUM FROM(SELECT AC_NAME,COUNT(AC_NAME) FROM TB_TOUR LEFT JOIN TB_WISHLIST USING(AC_NAME) GROUP BY AC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(AC_NAME)DESC)) JOIN TB_TOUR using(AC_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND ACT_LOCATION = #{location} AND AC_NAME != #{trName}
